Articles.Content:
I think that there should be a paint shop in ksp so you can make you rocket all 1 colour or add emblems and designs

this could make for a more unique rocket/plane (and be awsame)

(Apparently it is already planned but is low priority)

I think that when you go into the paint shop you should be able to select parts and colour them in or use custom skin or texture mods.

Instead of adding it into decals you could make it in its own building and import crafts in. (these are just ideas, i don\'t know much about how it will be achieved, but I know that the brilliant minds at SQUAD will be able to make something even better)

WANT WAIT FOR 0.16

What do you think?

is it a good idea?

Please discuss...

This is already a planned feature but probably won\'t be added till the latter stages of Alpha development.

That\'s what the 'Decals' tab was initially designed for.

Cheers!

Capt\'n Skunky

KSP Community Manager
